img_text: THANKS FOR EVERYTHING HERE, IT'S NOT MUCH, BUT... YES, HE DID IT. KIIBO LEARNED THE CENTIPEDE LOCK PLEASE, You SHOULDN'T HAVE! I'VE LEARNED A LOT MYSELF... WHY DIDN'T YOU TEACH HIM THE CENTIPEDE LOCK YOURSELF? IT'S YOUR TECHNIQUE, AFTER ALL... THAT SAID, THERE'S ONE THING I STILL DON'T UNDERSTAND. THE HORSE'S PROGRESSION DEPENDS ON THE RIGHT...?
